articles.title: Hero's first Vida Experience Centre opens in Bangalore - Team-BHP
articles.description: Vida, Hero MotoCorp’s electric vehicles sub-brand, has announced the opening of its first ‘Experience Centre’ in Bangalore. The Vida showroom is located at Vittal Mallya Road. The facility, spread over 8,500 sq. ft.
